name: XCTSourceCodeSymbolInfo
desc: An object that contains symbolication information for a specified frame in a call stack.

items.name: init(imageName: String, symbolName: String, location: XCTSourceCodeLocation?)
items.desc: Initializes an instance with a binary image name, source code location, and symbol name.

items.name: var imageName: String
items.desc: The name of the binary image that contains the symbolicated code.

items.name: var location: XCTSourceCodeLocation?
items.desc: A representation of a location in source code where a test issue occurred.

items.name: var symbolName: String
items.desc: A string that represents a human-readable symbol in source code.
